
Two careless admins shared primes while generating RSA keys. Recover the message from ciphertext1: 3684853614992701878321201379210389809292728406861678898716942075882169846590078853385700514864242707609949001810703566779797063692163947801183550694034108, ciphertext2: 385612316410808135917817685166260211240654956371232408226787177103710689653436560988930191582946885093975998340482790336667124804097102913730692079867555 using their public keys' common factor.


The flag format is flag{...}
n1=10768438135964785215592961246082689482446812498190092689502552185286353613876576977160565760004697131055227814112007428038232652427679581745237608110671693, n2=7092429491774872775698204409539166938141507937831759717353168450019686312038666383693741401635774555903113563604457234125837086072093850895938807960261083, e=480754713282775252888355495895926715867410982128372430399999375257427672254805971513246535862351506365580775679112075635357308193857424401395401476850653

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{q8za7nlg}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 3684853614992701878321201379210389809292728406861678898716942075882169846590078853385700514864242707609949001810703566779797063692163947801183550694034108, ciphertext2: 385612316410808135917817685166260211240654956371232408226787177103710689653436560988930191582946885093975998340482790336667124804097102913730692079867555
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=10768438135964785215592961246082689482446812498190092689502552185286353613876576977160565760004697131055227814112007428038232652427679581745237608110671693, n2=7092429491774872775698204409539166938141507937831759717353168450019686312038666383693741401635774555903113563604457234125837086072093850895938807960261083, e=480754713282775252888355495895926715867410982128372430399999375257427672254805971513246535862351506365580775679112075635357308193857424401395401476850653
